## Vec4.getPackedRGBAColor() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPackedRGBAColor(_normalized?: boolean): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_normalized | boolean | Format of the color stored in the Vec4, if true 0 - 1, else 0 - 255. |
